content:
# The stone furnace is currently working and has produced a total of 20 iron plates, with only 1 iron ore remaining to be smelted.
# 
# This is a significant improvement, as I now have enough iron plates to craft the Assembling Machine and still have some plates left over for other items.
# 
# I will now proceed to craft the Assembling Machine, which requires:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 5 Iron Gear Wheels (which I will need to craft first)

# Since I have 20 iron plates, I will craft 5 Iron Gear Wheels first, as they are necessary for the Assembling Machine.

craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)  # Crafting 5 Iron Gear Wheels.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking updated inventory after crafting.
